title: Jin Ye Chen Ni
overview: In order to save her brother who was in a vegetative state, Si Yue had no choice but to enter the Jian family and work as a substitute for the fourth miss of the Jian family to marry into the Lou family. By mistake, she recognised the frightening Lou Xiao as her fianc√©. From then on, she was surrounded by enemies on all sides and Lou Xiao, the person she was most afraid of, became the one who protected her with his life.
